LionUtils 5.0.1 API

Packages 
Package Description
adudecalledleo.lionutils
Contains various general and miscellaneous utility classes.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.block
Contains subclasses of Block that should either be subclassed themselves or, if not abstract, constructed directly.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.block.entity.listener
Contains listeners for use with BaseBlockWithEntity.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.client.color
Contain classes to deal with colors.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.client.render
Contains classes to deal with rendering.
WARNING: All classes in this package and its sub-packages should only be called in a client environment! Calling them in a dedicated server environment will invariably lead to a crash!!!
adudecalledleo.lionutils.config
Contains classes to deal with loading and saving configurations.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.entity
Contains classes to deal with the mess that Mojang calls this game's entity system.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.inventory
Contains utility classes for handling Inventorys.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.mixin
Contains Mixins used by this library.
Mixins in this package can be safely used by mods that depend on this library.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.network
Contains classes used for network operations.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.serialize
Contains classes used for serialization and deserialization of objects.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe
